example: This book is more interesting than the other one.
This painting is more beautiful than that one.
That car is more expensive than mine.
This chair is more comfortable than the old one.
This problem is more difficult than before.
The ride was more exciting than expected.
The movie was more interesting than I thought.
This cake is more delicious than the last one.
This watch is more expensive than that one.
These shoes are more comfortable than the old ones.
The second chapter is more interesting.
The garden is more beautiful in spring.
The exam was more difficult than last year.
The game was more exciting in the last minute.
He is more active now than before.
